songs.title: For My Weed Heads
songs.lyrics:
I dedicate this one to all the buddha lovers all across the world, all over the globe, from amsterdam to humble county, miami, atlanta, seattle, L.A., New York. This is how we do it baby. Im tired, blaze one up and sit back and ride one out
This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads, this is for my weed heads.Weed dont do no harm.This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads,this is for my weed heads works just like a charm.Roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us.Nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us.Take two hits and pass it,roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us, nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us,off two hits your blastin
I can't believe it, im tweated for the gray goose nigga im fried, this side of the night to drive fucked around and caught a DUI to much intoxication fucked up then im on probation its a jacked up situation and then my P.O. is who im facin, gotta take piss test after piss test im so stressed that i might brake. Another mistake i can't take can't violate my probae. In jail its no good, im smoke free i can't see ima smoke til the day i D-I-E thats just keepin it real about me
This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads, this is for my weed heads.Weed dont do no harm.This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads,this is for my weed heads works just like a charm.Roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us.Nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us.Take two hits and pass it,roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us, nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us,off two hits your blastin
You want me to give up indonesia, hydroponics, chocolate tide, oh me oh my i gotta high high high maui wowi, blueberry, purple haze,dont tell me you want me to give up smokin you jokin cuz you can't help me give me raspberry flavored blunts then again make that a kanye dip this weed on contact im high and im ready for combat.Can't believe this is happenin to me let me do a community service like a thug caught up in the system,paranoid and im livin nervous and you ask me is this worth it look god its mandatory that i creap and i smoke my reefer thats me and thats my story
This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads, this is for my weed heads.Weed dont do no harm.This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads,this is for my weed heads works just like a charm.Roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us.Nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us.Take two hits and pass it,roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us, nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us,off two hits your blastin
If you just legalize the weedman, it will minimize our crime rate everybody be doin there own thing wit nobody havin time to hate, sit down the bush and blow a blunt and i bet they won't be thinkin bout war.Theyll be giggilin wit the munchies thinkin bout ways to feed the poor shore to shore, sea to sea, we all got beats but its in the lead thats why i believe in savin the leaf and all you gotta do is smoke it wit me,roll it wit me,toke it wit me,blowin fifty on this pound,im tryin to get the world to smoke so blaze it up and pass it around
This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads, this is for my weed heads.Weed dont do no harm.This is for my weed heads, strictly for my weed heads,this is for my weed heads works just like a charm.Roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us.Nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us.Take two hits and pass it,roll it up, smoke it up, you wanna get high you can toke wit us, nuthin but bomb or you funk wit us,off two hits your blastin
Take two hits and pass it.Off two hits you blastin
